message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 4000, and I'll take 6000. You can't do better than that!
You said it's a fair split, but I think I deserve more!
You wanted more, but I'm not giving up that much. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, but I'll meet you halfway
You're not budging, I'm not either. I'll take 7000, and you can have the rest. That's my final offer!
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not afraid of your tough tactics!
I'm not going to back down. I'll take 8000, and you can have the scraps. That's my final offer!
You're not getting the best of me, I'll take the last laugh!
